titleStmt.title: A faithfull and faire warning humbly presented to the knights, gentlemen, clergie-men, yeomen, and other the inhabitants of the county of Suffolke ... / by Lionel Gatford ...
Faithfull and faire warning
titleStmt.author: Gatford, Lionel, d. 1665.

notesStmt.note: First issue, with t.p. uncancelled; reissued the same year with cancel t.p.: "Englands complaint" and imprint, London : Printed in the yeere 1648.
Title page repaired, but still partially illegible; apparently had been slit to indicate cancellation.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
